TEXT.TITLE: VMS SHORT TERM INCOME TRUST <VST> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 34 cts vs 32 cts Net 2,328,515 vs 2,175,046 12 mths Shr 1.14 dlrs vs 1.25 dlrs Net 7,857,997 vs 8,615,439 NOTE company attributed decrease to significant drop in prime lending rate as its principal business is pegged to the interest rate. Reuter
